content:
All Japan Tours offers a range of packages, and I can provide you with a customized quote for a 7-night package that includes flights, hotel, and guided tours, with an ocean-view room in Tokyo.

Here's a sample package quote:

**Package Name:** Tokyo Ocean View Getaway

**Duration:** 7 nights / 8 days

**Flights:**

* Round-trip economy airfare from [Your City] to Tokyo (Narita or Haneda airport)
* Airline: [Choose from a selection of airlines, such as Japan Airlines, ANA, or United]

**Hotel:**

* 7 nights at the [Hotel Nikko Tokyo Daiba](https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/NKTDIHH-Hotel-Nikko-Tokyo-Daiba/) or similar
* Ocean-view room with balcony overlooking Tokyo Bay
* Hotel amenities: fitness center, indoor pool, restaurants, and bars

**Guided Tours:**

* Tokyo City Tour: Explore Tokyo's iconic landmarks, including the Tokyo Tower, Meiji Shrine, and Shibuya Crossing
* Nikko World Heritage Tour: Visit the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Toshogu Shrine and other historic sites in Nikko
* Hakone Day Trip: Enjoy a scenic cruise on Lake Ashi and take in the views of Mt. Fuji (subject to weather conditions)

**Package Price:**

* $3,495 per person (based on double occupancy)
* $4,295 per person (based on single occupancy)

**Inclusions:**

* Round-trip airfare from [Your City] to Tokyo
* 7 nights' accommodation at Hotel Nikko Tokyo Daiba or similar
* Daily breakfast and select lunches and dinners
* Guided tours as mentioned above
* Airport transfers and transportation between destinations

**Optional Upgrades:**

* Upgrade to a luxury hotel, such as the Park Hyatt Tokyo or the Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo, from $500 per person
* Add a private guide for the Tokyo City Tour from $200 per person
* Book a traditional Japanese ryokan stay in Hakone from $300 per person

Please note that this is a sample quote, and actual prices may vary depending on your travel dates, flight availability, and other factors. I recommend contacting All Japan Tours directly to get a customized quote and to book your package.

Also, keep in mind that ocean-view rooms are subject to availability, and the hotel may not be able to guarantee an ocean-view room. However, All Japan Tours will do their best to accommodate your request.
